Query:
'''
    select 
    e.PcrKey
    , r.ePatient_14 as Race
    from events e 
    left join race r on r.PcrKey = e.PcrKey
    where e.PcrKey in ('170673651', '170842685', '170985046', '171458988')
    
'''

|  PcrKey  |  Race  |
|  170673651  |  2514001  |
|  170673651  |  2514003  |
|  170673651  |  2514005  |
|  170673651  |  2514007  |
|  170673651  |  2514009  |
|  170673651  |  2514011  |
|  170842685  |  2514001  |
|  170842685  |  2514003  |
|  170842685  |  2514005  |
|  170842685  |  2514007  |
|  170842685  |  2514009  |
|  170842685  |  2514011  |
|  170985046  |  2514001  |
|  170985046  |  2514003  |
|  170985046  |  2514005  |
|  170985046  |  2514007  |
|  170985046  |  2514009  |
|  170985046  |  2514011  |
|  171458988  |  2514001  |
|  171458988  |  2514003  |
